subject: Economy
question_en: What is the definition of GDP?
question_hi: GDP क्या समझने के लिए मतलब है?
A_en: GDP is the total value of goods and services produced in a country.
A_hi: एग्ड को GDP को तैयार राज्य में निर्माण करने वाले आत्मसंरक्षण
B_en: GDP is the sum of all consumer spending, government spending, and net exports.
B_hi: एग्ड को GDP को सभी आवश्यक आवश्यक प्रयोगशायर
C_en: GDP is the value of all goods and services produced in an economy.
C_hi: एग्ड को GDP को एक शास्त्रीय अर्थ में निर्माण
D_en: GDP is the total value of all goods and services produced in a region.
D_hi: एग्ड को GDP को एक क्षेत्रीय अर्थ में निर्माण
E_en: GDP is the sum of all value added by various sectors in an economy.
E_hi: एग्ड को GDP को विभिज्ञानी स्थान में निर्माण
F_en: GDP is calculated as the sum of all private consumption, government consumption, investment, and net exports.
F_hi: एग्ड को GDP को विभिज्ञानी स्थान में निर्माण
G_en: GDP is calculated based on three main categories: consumption, investment, and net exports.
G_hi: एग्ड को GDP को तीनों प्रमोट में निर्माण
H_en: GDP is calculated as the sum of personal consumption, government consumption, investment, and net exports.
H_hi: एग्ड को GDP को कार्तरीन मुद्रा को निर्माण
I_en: GDP is the value of all goods and services produced within a country.
I_hi: एग्ड को GDP को एक देश में निर्माण
J_en: GDP is the total value of goods and services produced in a country.
J_hi: एग्ड को GDP को एक देश में निर्माण
K_en: GDP can be used as a measure of a country's economic performance.
K_hi: एग्ड को GDP को एक देश के कैलेक्टोरियाँ को निर्माण
L_en: GDP of a country is determined by multiplying 3 components: consumption, investment, and net exports.
L_hi: एग्ड को एक देश के कैलेक्टोरियाँ को निर्माण
M_en: GDP of a region is the sum of industries, agriculture, and services.
M_hi: एग्ड को GDP को एक सिगंड कैलेक्टोरियाँ को GDP को निर्माण
N_en: GDP reflects the overall economic growth of a country.
N_hi: एग्ड को GDP को GDP को निर्माण
O_en: GDP is calculated based on the value added by businesses in a country.
O_hi: एग्ड को GDP को GDP को निर्माण
P_en: GDP measures the total value of goods and services produced in a country.
P_hi: एग्ड को GDP को GDP को निर्माण
Q_en: GDP shows the economic growth of a country over time.
Q_hi: एग्ड को GDP को GDP को निर्माण
